name: unhoppy (MaxMitchell, AstronotCB, Max!)
description:
A lonely legless frog needs your help on his hopless adventure!

Arson the Frog can't afford prosthetics. . .but fortunately the local store is having a sale! only problem is, it's a limited time offer -- Arson needs to get there quickly before the store closes! can you help him???

If you complete the game, share a screenshot of your results! The fastest time up the mountain so far is held by Max Lama, at 1:36.82! (No easy mode or Radius Indicator)

CONTROLS:

Move the mouse to aim

Left-click and hold to stick out your tongue!

Press the pause button or press "ESC" to pause

Having difficulty with a section of the game? Try "Easy Mode" from the pause menu!

Having difficulty using the tongue? Try enabling the tongue radius indicator from the pause menu!

FEATURES:

  • a loveable main character
  • nine beautiful stamps to collect
  • multiple ending cutscenes to discover
  • a journey like no other

NOTE: you can control the audio from the pause menu (top slider is master volume, middle slider music, bottom is sound effects)

CREDITS:

Programming: Max Mitchell

Art & Animation: Max Lama & Conor Toland

Music: Max Mitchell

Built in under 72 hours for Mini Jam 106
